name: Renovation Hunter
summary: An application for homeowners to post jobs and for contractors to find jobs.

name: NFL Quiz
summary: An application that allows users to test their NFL knowledge and track high scores.

name: Calorie Counter
summary: An application to help the user track daily calories by mealtype throughout the day.

name: Note Taker
summary: An application for posting, saving and deleting notes.

name: Weather Dashboard
summary: An application for searching the current and future weather conditions by city.

name: Eat-Da-Burger
summary: An application that allows users to track types of burgers and whether or not they were devoured or not.
